ygData.subject: Re: A Spark of Hope
ygData.msgSnippet: Hidden and silenced. The spark dimly glowed within the deep recesses of another. Unsure and unaware of it s surroundings, of it s situation, of it s future.

Hidden and silenced. The spark dimly glowed within the deep recesses of 
an=
other. Unsure and unaware of it's surroundings, of it's situation, of 
it's=
 future. 
The poor spark remained isolated and silent. But it was a miracle=
 that 
a spark lasted this long.
